title: Question:
author: Sam nickelsson
content: I need a telegram bot for my channel and does anyone know any platform?

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Telegram bots offers functions and automations that enables users complete some certain functions in their chats, they can be done by man ways either by using Botfather or telegram bot APL and Own bit builder.Botfather manages all the bots you can create in with via your telegram account, and own bot builder make it possible for developers and newbies to interact and build chatbots in a bot Framework, while the telegram bot APL is a Hypertext transfer protocol based interface mainly for developers having a common interest in building bots.
